ygData.subject: Libary Book Quest starting in Erudin

ygData.messageBody:
May be spoiler********











Many wizards who start their careers in Erudin may know of this quest. It is to seek out the Testamnet of Vanear.

I am currently at the point in the quest where I must travel to Highhold Pass

In the Keep I must find a fellow named Ran the Librarian.

My question is: What lvl should I be before attempting to go to HighHold Pass. I have heard this is a dangerous place to travel at lower levels. I am currently lvl 7.

Thanks for your answers ahead of time,

Dason

Intrests in things Arcane.
